name: 64 Pixels of Cute
description:
#LowRezJam

Help the lovely cat Kuymak to collect the hearts with your arrow (or A and D) keys. She wants your love!

Music&SFX:
Alyx Jones

Design, Art, Coding:
Ahmet Kamil Keleş

You can upscale the game by pressing the fullscreen button. The game is still pixelated that way.
